pages.text: $(li)Q:How do i charge chakra?'$(li2)A:Stand still, eat pills or sleep$(li)Q:'How do i obtain the ms / ems in singleplayer?'$(li2)A:You cant obtain your own, you would need to cheat/ spawn it in$(li)Q:'Why does eating zetsu flesh kill me?'$(li2)A:It does between 24 and 240 damage at random unless you have the ms / ems equipped
$(li)Q:'Can i become a jin in singleplayer?' $(li2)A:Only via obtaining it in place of a kg
